name: Fight and Flight
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
If the target is not defeated, After the attack:  If able, move 3 spaces in a straight line.

name: Fight or Flight
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
If the target is not defeated, After the attack:  If able, move 3 spaces in a straight line.

name: Hurry up!
text:
Set the printed ::initiative:: Initiative value of an unresolved card of a hero in range to 11, until it is resolved, or otherwise changes state.
_(This may change the initiative order and tie breakers.)_

name: The Ultimate Trick
text: You choose the next action, and how it is performed, for a hero you target with the “Hurry Up!”.

name: Unexpected Journey
text:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero, regardless of radius and immunity.

name: Helping Hand
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range, adjacent to your friendly hero.

name: Monkey Trick
text: Swap two friendly units in radius.

name: There and Back Again
text:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero, regardless of radius and immunity.

name: Even the Odds
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range, adjacent to your friendly hero.

name: Monkey Twist
text: Swap two friendly heroes in radius.

name: This Way!
text: A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance of 1 or 2; move both of you that number of spaces in the same direction of your choice.

name: Outnumber
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a minion in range, adjacent to your friendly hero.

name: Hear Nothing
text: Swap with an enemy hero in radius.

name: Safe Travels
text:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero, regardless of radius and immunity. You may move 1 space.

name: Trusted Sidekick
text:
**Choose one, or both,** in any order —
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range, adjacent to your friendly hero and not adjacent to you.

name: Monkey Business
text:
Swap two friendly units in radius.
You may move 1 space.

name: That Way!
text: A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance of 1, 2, or 3; move both of you that number of spaces in the same direction of your choice.

name: Pile On
text:
**Choose one, or both,** in any order —
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a minion in range, adjacent to your friendly.

name: See Nothing
text:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
You may move 1 space.
